radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: contrast-enhanced MR imaging of the head
radiographic_examinations.findings: Extra-axial peripherally enhancing soft-tissue lesion extending through the diploic space and showing mass effect in the right frontal lobe.
Ill-defined heterogeneous hypoechoic lesions with internal echoes, and heterogeneous rim surrounding some of the lesions.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: contrast-enhanced CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple complex low-attenuation lesions throughout the liver and a complex low-attenuation lesion in the spleen; no lung or breast mass.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: dynamic contrast-enhanced CT of the abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: Large heterogeneous T2 hyperintense lesion in the spleen and multiple heterogeneous T2 hyperintense lesions throughout the liver.
Did not show abnormal FDG uptake in the lesions.
Acute subdural and epidural hemorrhage causing mass effect in the brain and subfalcine herniation.
